class.name: UnivariateDifferentiableVectorFunction

javadoc.text: Extension of {@link UnivariateVectorFunction} representing a univariate differentiable vectorial function.
Compute the value for the function.
javadoc.param: x the point for which the function value should be computed
javadoc.exception: MathIllegalArgumentException if {@code x} does not * satisfy the function's constraints (argument out of bound, or unsupported * derivative order for example)
